title.narrative: Dialogue@Work IDN

description.narrative: Strengthening an inclusive, constructive social dialogue on socio-economic policies at national and decentralised levels Improved labour rights and a living wage for workers in supply chains. Greater employability of young people More equality in employment rights and salary, and more power in the workplace for women
Trade Unions and workers
increasing inclusive economic development and a fairer distribution of work and income.
Commitment to country project
Expenditures 2021
Payment to our partner organisations
Payment to our partner organisations
